index_terms: CHICAGO MILWAUKEE ST. PAUL PACIFIC RAILROAD
summary: An ordinance relating to the franchise granted to Oregon Washington Railroad & Navigation Company, the Great Northern Railway Company, the Northern Pacific Railway Company, and the Chicago, Milwaukee and St. Paul Railway Company, and to any one or more of them, their successors and assigns, by Ordinance No. 37549; amending said ordinance to provide for changes in the franchise right of way occasioned by the construction and maintenance of the Alaskan Way Viaduct Extension; specifically amending Section 2 thereof with a view to providing for such changes; and providing for the acceptance by the grantees of said franchise as so modified.
